pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sakabaḷena mukhena byāharanti …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk43:1.5_0: Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca sakabaḷena mukhena byāharati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
